wikipedia_page.main: Paul Stallan (born 1967 in Glasgow) is an architect based in the United Kingdom.

response: Diagrams of gear systems that had been proposed in the very first concepts were modelled by Kettle using his 8-year-old daughter's Lego. Drawings and artist impressions were shown to clients and funders. The visitor centre was designed by another RMJM architect, Paul Stallan.
